Package controller

Class RegisterController

java.lang.Object
controller.RegisterController
public class RegisterController extends Object
This Register Controller class is responsible for registering, handling methods between repository and the Boundary classes

  • Method Details

    • login

      public static User login(String username, String password, User role)
      Authenticates a user based on username, password, and role.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the personnel
      password - the password of the personnel
      role - the role of the personnel (admin, doctor, pharmacist, or patient)
      Returns:
      the authenticated User object if successful, otherwise null

    • verifyPassword

      private static boolean verifyPassword(User personnel, String password)
      Verifies the password by comparing the entered password with the stored password hash.
      Parameters:
      personnel - the personnel whose password is being verified
      password - the password entered by the user
      Returns:
      true if the password matches the stored password hash, false otherwise

    • updatePassword

      public static boolean updatePassword(User personnel, String newPassword)
      Updates the password for a given personnel.
      Parameters:
      personnel - the personnel whose password is to be updated
      newPassword - the new password to set
      Returns:
      true if the password is updated successfully, false otherwise

    • registerPatient

      public static String registerPatient(String fullName, String username, String email, String phoneNo, String passwordHash, LocalDateTime DoB, String gender, String allergies, LocalDateTime dateOfAdmission)
      Registers a new patient.
      Parameters:
      fullName - the full name of the patient
      username - the username for the patient
      email - the email address of the patient
      phoneNo - the phone number of the patient
      passwordHash - the hashed password for the patient
      DoB - the date of birth of the patient
      gender - the gender of the patient
      allergies - the allergies of the patient
      dateOfAdmission - the date the patient was admitted
      Returns:
      the UID of the newly registered patient

    • registerDoctor

      public static boolean registerDoctor(String fullName, String username, String email, String phoneNo, String passwordHash, LocalDateTime DoB, String gender, LocalDateTime dateJoin)
      Registers a new doctor.
      Parameters:
      fullName - the full name of the doctor
      username - the username for the doctor
      email - the email address of the doctor
      phoneNo - the phone number of the doctor
      passwordHash - the hashed password for the doctor
      DoB - the date of birth of the doctor
      gender - the gender of the doctor
      dateJoin - the date the doctor joined
      Returns:
      true if the doctor is registered successfully, false otherwise

    • registerPharmacist

      public static boolean registerPharmacist(String fullName, String username, String email, String phoneNo, String passwordHash, LocalDateTime DoB, String gender, LocalDateTime dateOfEmployment)

      Parameters:
      fullName - the full name of the pharmacist
      username - the username for the pharmacist
      email - the email address of the pharmacist
      phoneNo - the phone number of the pharmacist
      passwordHash - the hashed password for the pharmacist
      DoB - the date of birth of the pharmacist
      gender - the gender of the pharmacist
      dateOfEmployment - the date the pharmacist was employed
      Returns:
      true if the pharmacist is registered successfully, false otherwise

      email - the email address of the admin
      phoneNo - the phone number of the admin
      passwordHash - the hashed password for the admin
      DoB - the date of birth of the admin
      gender - the gender of the admin
      dateOfCreation - the date the admin account was created
